titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of unobligated abandoned mine land funds by the State of Kentucky, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.

bill.summary: 6/21/1988--Introduced. Directs the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement to make available to the State of Kentucky certain unobligated Abandoned Mine Land Funds for use by such State for Butler County water project activities.
